Html:
Is the optimization feature working? Currently it is very hard to optimize because there are no filters for the new zones. As an enhancement shawmy im trying to find the best balance of hit, expertise, and AP. Any info would be helpful.
Thanks

The Optimizer should work fine, and has nothing to do with filters on items (by zone, or by anything else). Make sure you read the text on the Optimizer window, sounds like you're not understanding what it's for; you need to mark what items you have available.
